-- SCR#735 04.02.2002 SH (Selected new field in Task 'create DELAY_INTEREST_TOTAL', DLIT_INVOICENO
First call tasks for calculating total amount (PO.INTEREST)
If PO.INTEREST > = CLNT318_MINAMOUNT then with parameter 'write'
with testinterest because this value is recalculated
